title: PwC
description: Offering a comprehensive software solution that streamlines and automates non-financial reporting for ESG data, this service stands out by aligning with NFRD and CSRD regulations to support diverse industries in sustainability management.

children.value: Offering a comprehensive software solution that streamlines and automates non-financial reporting for ESG data, this service stands out by aligning with NFRD and CSRD regulations to support diverse industries in sustainability management.
